Reviews.Title: “Loved this Updated Hotel”

Reviews.Content: location inside town looking hotel service clean updated compfortable stay walking distance restaurants try el agave accross street real mexican food americanized recommend looks courtyard otherwise youll street noise

Reviews.Title: “A bit disorganized.”
Reviews.Author: PassTravelF00l
Reviews.Content: arrived late night trip quickly checked sent key cards didnt ongoing issue entire stay sometimes keys allow onto property sometimes wouldnt keys allow enter failed attempts night check overnight handyman master key failed door day issue started themselves nice air conditioning beds comfortable nice tvs minifridges overall pretty typical fairfield inns am elite marriott standing request available wasnt honored trip placed floors facility floor actually street level people looking stay hate black curtains closed entire stay eventually location nice key card issue hotel fine staff pleasant helpful clean comfortable layout facility odd confusing time im san diego ill probably search elsewhere stay wouldnt offer strong recommendation hotel

Reviews.Title: “Staff not helpful”
Reviews.Author: pickyreno
Reviews.Content: town street nice resturant staff check helpful rude didnt directions funny elevators building connected renovated shuttle service nice streets town staff obviously marriott basic training hotel service industry seriously annoyed stay onsite laundry 1 wd yes 1 secured locked hallways requiring key enter 100 clean safe breakfast ws standard pool cold taste hot tub decent size lay property confusing beds comfortable

Reviews.Title: “New ownership, newly remodeled, great service”

Reviews.Content: location town hotel entirely refurbished 2012 ownership comfortable clean microwaves staff hotel friendly accommodating free internet yay breakfast free basic waffles microwave egg toast bagels industrial muffins fruit cold cereal instant oatmeal coffee juices nice pool gym car parking costs 15 month unless try spot street hard restaurant lot restaurants town try latin standout gem town easy walking distance hotel local tourist traps 4250 bistro 4250 congress st corner

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”

Reviews.Content: property pleasant surprise warm friendly front desk greating beautifully appointed guest dining common grounds steps main street town local historical charm california truely enjoyed look comfortability fairfield inn hank

Reviews.Title: “Great Location In Old Town SD”
Reviews.Author: GHTfromHB
Reviews.Content: quick checkin front desk queen bed family renovated nice comfortable nice flat screen tv def free wifi plus beds comfortable overlooking street found quiet little street noise breakfast comparable fairfield marriotts stayed short walk main town location convenient town interstate 5 pleasant night stay family easter break stay

Reviews.Title: “Great place!”
Reviews.Author: Brenda M
Reviews.Content: spent night hotel heading san ignacio trip gray whales hotel met expectations recently changed ownership upgrade hotel incovenience guests obviously newly remodeled extremely comfortable comfortable beds slept decor modern tasteful clean hotel staff friendly shuttle service picked promptly called arrived airport continental breakfast pretty normal menu met hotel walking distance restaurtants definitely stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “I really liked this hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel completely remodeled nice awesome pillows breakfast morning nice eat location awesome regards town literally corner walk block

Reviews.Title: “Very nice property-delicious breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: MelissaCassidy
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 night february sea world staff attentive clean maintained beds comfortable didnt morning morning breakfast served own breakfast sandwiches yogurt muffins cereal oatmeal wont leave hungry overall highly recommend staying

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and location in San Diego”
Reviews.Author: samcoronado
Reviews.Content: property holiday inn recently converted fairfield inn fresh top bottom contemporary look bubbling fountains beautiful grounds technology friendly welcoming staff quiet clean local art comfortable beds flat screen tvs ipod docking clock free breakfast choices oatmeal yogurts fresh fruit makeyourown waffles cereals pastries addition table seating communal table power outlets eat check email time gym equipment individual tvs nice pool jacuzzi convenient freeway onramp gas stations blocks fighting traffic start home stay am san diego

Reviews.Title: “Old Hotel trying to be passed off as New”
Reviews.Author: sbktravels
Reviews.Content: ok hate bash marriott time respond stay hotel period claim hotel yes marriott stayed 2 nights 2 nights awful smell switched available doors awful plastic meth smell secure hotel 3 stories 3 foot wall outside separated elevator staff unfriendly breakfast below subpar stay unless major improvements disappointed coming charged parking street security

Reviews.Content: hotel marriott website looks remodel previous business window cant patio equipment clean facilities front desk little bit slow hotel bed sheet restroom worth mention offer real fruit real fruit juice package dont drink juice fountain machine 31 water juice

Reviews.Title: “Great New Hotel!”

Reviews.Content: spot staying holiday inn express apparently changed name real treat changed hotel wow looking hotel free breakfast finally wifi worth extra money stay nice

Reviews.Title: “Good location for an end-of-trip stay”
Reviews.Author: Amanda S
Reviews.Content: stayed night 2011 hotel holiday inn express sounds lot changes im comment location chose stay town tail trip palm springs san diego locationwise hotel delivered found easy street parking hotel didnt move car morning time head airport dont afraid park street hotel easy walking distance plenty restaurants town historic park caught saturday market walked blocks explore houses heritage park
